faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.

q1.question: Is 123LegalDoc a law firm?
q1.answer: No, 123LegalDoc is not a law firm and does not provide legal advice. We provide self-help services at your direction. See our Disclaimer.

q2.question: Are the documents legally binding?
q2.answer: Our documents are drafted based on common legal requirements. However, laws vary by jurisdiction and specific circumstances. We recommend consulting a lawyer for complex situations.

q3.question: How much does it cost?
q3.answer: We offer a simple pay-per-document model. Most individual documents cost $35. Some complex documents or bundles may vary. See our Pricing page for details.

q4.question: Can I customize the documents?
q4.answer: Yes! You answer a series of guided questions, and your answers populate the document. You can then preview and often make further edits before finalizing.

q5.question: What if I need help?
q5.answer: Our AI assistant can help guide you, and we have a comprehensive FAQ and support team available. For legal advice, please consult a qualified attorney.

q6.question: Is my information secure?
q6.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Please see our Privacy Policy for more details.
